ai-tha-ap304:1.1_0: “I’ve given a gift to give it,
ai-tha-ap304:1.2_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap304:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap304:2.4_0: this gift is the fruit of scent.
ai-tha-ap304:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sabbakāmī.
ai-tha-ap304:6.1_0: The second of all ties for the Elders.
